content: venetian crochet patterns for 1915 motif collar and lace edging needlecraft publishing co published 1915 also published as figure 36 in the same publisher s handbook of crochet no 2 1 available in pdf form from the antique pattern library pattern has been re-written by sandi marshall in modern-day terminology 1 http //www antiquepatternlibrary org/pub/pdf/handbookofcrochet2 pdf
